mapper.update:
update sys_layout
menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
layout_type = #{layoutType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remake = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

api_name = #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cols = #{cols,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
layout_json = #{layoutJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_layout set menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, layout_type = #{layoutType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remake = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, api_name = #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cols = #{cols,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, layout_json = #{layoutJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_layout set menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, layout_type = #{layoutType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remake = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, api_name = #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cols = #{cols,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.menu_id, l.layout_json, l.layout_type, l.remake, l.created_by, l.created_time, l.updated_by, l.updated_time, l.enabled, l.api_name, l.cols, l.`code`, (select DISTINCT layout_json from sys_roule where roule_id=#{merchantNo} and type=3 and control_id=l.id ) as roule_json from sys_layout l
